scripts.archive: cd $CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH && (git merge --abort >/dev/null 2>&1 || true) && ((git diff --quiet && git diff --cached --quiet) || git stash push -u -m "conductor-archive") && git fetch origin && (git merge origin/main --ff-only && echo "✅ Synced with origin/main") || (echo "⚠️  Cannot fast-forward: main has diverged from origin/main" && echo "" && echo "Local commits not in origin:" && git log --oneline main ^origin/main && echo "" && echo "Options:" && echo "  1. Discard local: git reset --hard origin/main" && echo "  2. Push first:    git push origin main" && exit 1)
